messages.subject: [NHEN-SpeakOut] Homeschooling in the News 4/8/01
messages.msgSnippet: April 8 New York Times : Just Sitting Around Thinking, or Not http://www.nytimes.com/2001/04/08/education/08ED-HOME.html An article about unschooling and the
messages.messageBody:
April 8
New York Times : Just Sitting Around Thinking, or Not
http://www.nytimes.com/2001/04/08/education/08ED-HOME.html
An article about unschooling and the Pathfinder Center.

Ledger-Enquirer : Barnesville home-schooler wins Georgia geography bee
http://www.l-e-o.com/content/columbus/2001/04/08/news/0408GeographyBee.htm

World Net Daily : Home-schoolers' college wins debate honors
http://www.worldnetdaily.com/news/article.asp?ARTICLE_ID=22327

April 7
Billings Gazette : Geography champ wins trip to D.C.
http://www.billingsgazette.com/index.php?section=local&display=content/local/3

champ.inc
Homeschooled boy wins

Missoulian : Missoula boy wins state geography bee
http://www.missoulian.com/display/inn_news/news17.txt

Indianapolis Star : Home-school student wins geographic bee on his third try
http://www.starnews.com/news/articles/bee0407.html

Island Packet : Heritage awards allotted
http://www.islandpacket.com/localnews/story/0,1946,254898,00.html
Homeschooler one of several award winners

April 6
Houston Chronicle : Number of home-schooled kids rises as school shootings
climb
http://www.chron.com/cs/CDA/story.hts/nation/869900

Minor mentions:

April 8
Pioneer Press : Protesters demand tax reforms
http://www.pioneerplanet.com/docs/head3.htm

Evansville Courier & Press : Lawmakers attend militia meeting
http://www.courierpress.com/cgi-bin/view.cgi?/200104/08+lawmakers040801_news.h

tml+20010408+news

April 7
Daily News : Kids map way to win
http://www.dailynews.com/news/articles/0401/07/new15.asp

Topeka Capital-Journal : Allen County speller unseats 2-time champ
http://cjonline.com/stories/040801/kan_spelling08.shtml


Laura Derrick
National Home Education Network
http://www.nhen.org
